dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: stratumType
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores data about the types of strata included in a plot and for which taxon-specific cover was recorded. It is anticipated that various authors will apply different meanings to the common strata types and this entity will allow the database user to determine exactly what the plot author meant by each stratum included in his/her plot. Moreover, if the author chooses to use a formerly unused name he/she will be able to define the stratum in this table.

attribute.attNotes: Primary Key for the stratumType table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique stratum defined.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the stratumMethod table
attribute.attDefinition: Foreign key indicating to which stratum method this stratum belongs.

This is the name of the stratum. Notice that the structure of this table allows for multiple meanings to be applied to a specific stratum name, but that each plot will be linked to a unique name/meaning pair.
Text string describing what is meant by the stratum name.
